snippet: Police say someone at a gate area at Los Angeles International Airport spread the mistaken word that an armed man was on the loose Monday, sending about 20 passengers fleeing through emergency doors and onto the tarmac.
lead_paragraph: Police say someone at a gate area at Los Angeles International Airport spread the mistaken word that an armed man was on the loose Monday, sending about 20 passengers fleeing through emergency doors and onto the tarmac.

headline.main: California: Travelers Flee After Erroneous Message
headline.print_headline: California: Travelers Flee After Erroneous Message
